name: Abomination
desc: You seek to instill abhorrence and horror in those around you.

name: Air
desc: You can control winds and the weather.

name: Ambition
desc: You strive to keep up with and outpace the competition.

name: Change
desc: You can restructure the physical and metaphysical.

name: Cities
desc: You have powers over urban environments and denizens.

name: Cold
desc: You control ice, snow, and freezing temperatures.

name: Confidence
desc: You overcome your fear and project pride.

name: Creation
desc: You have divine abilities related to crafting and art.

name: Darkness
desc: You operate in the darkness and take away the light.

name: Death
desc: You have the power to end lives and destroy undead.

name: Decay
desc: You have the power to spoil and deteriorate matter.

name: Delirium
desc: You can bring about hallucinations and restlessness.

name: Destruction
desc: You are a conduit for divine devastation.

name: Dreams
desc: You have the power to enter and manipulate dreams.

name: Dust
desc: You have the power to dry and crumble what opposes you.

name: Duty
desc: You defend oaths and carry out your divine missions with great dedication.

name: Earth
desc: You control soil and stone.

name: Family
desc: You aid and protect your family and community more effectively.

name: Fate
desc: You see and understand hidden inevitabilities.

name: Fire
desc: You control flame.

name: Freedom
desc: You liberate yourself and others from shackles and constraints.

name: Glyph
desc: You wield power over written words and symbols.

name: Healing
desc: Your healing magic is particularly potent.

name: Indulgence
desc: You feast mightily and can shake off the effects of overindulging.

name: Knowledge
desc: You receive divine insights.

name: Lightning
desc: You control electricity, thunder, and storms.

name: Luck
desc: You're unnaturally lucky and keep out of harm's way.

name: Magic
desc: You perform the unexpected and inexplicable.

name: Might
desc: Your physical power is bolstered by divine strength.

name: Moon
desc: You command powers associated with the moon.

name: Naga
desc: Like the serpentine nagas, you're in tune with cosmic forces that Ravithra once controlled.

name: Nature
desc: You hold power over animals and plants.

name: Nightmares
desc: You fill minds with horror and dread.

name: Pain
desc: You punish those who displease you with the sharp sting of pain.

name: Passion
desc: You evoke passion, whether as love or lust.

name: Perfection
desc: You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.

name: Plague
desc: You wield disease and pestilence like a weapon.

name: Protection
desc: You ward yourself and others.

name: Repose
desc: You ease mental burdens.

name: Secrecy
desc: You protect secrets and keep them hidden.

name: Sorrow
desc: You have a painful connection to melancholy and sadness.

name: Soul
desc: You wield power over the spiritual.

name: Star
desc: You command the power of the stars.

name: Sun
desc: You harness the power of the sun and other light sources, and punish undead.

name: Swarm
desc: You exert control over masses of creatures.

name: Time
desc: You reign over the flow of time.

name: Toil
desc: You work constantly and refuse to let anything stand in your way.

name: Travel
desc: You have power over movement and journeys.

name: Trickery
desc: You deceive others and cause mischief.

name: Truth
desc: You pierce lies and discover the truth.

name: Tyranny
desc: You wield power to rule and enslave others.

name: Undeath
desc: Your magic carries close ties to the undead.

name: Vigil
desc: You watch over those long passed and guard their secrets.

name: Void
desc: You draw power from emptiness.

name: Water
desc: You control water and bodies of water.

name: Wealth
desc: You hold power over wealth, trade, and treasure.

name: Wyrmkin
desc: You draw on the power of dragons, linnorms, and other powerful reptilian creatures.

name: Zeal
desc: Your inner fire increases your combat prowess.
